verses.verse: The whole <S%H776>earth<s%> was of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8193>language<s%> and of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1697>speech.<s%>
It <S%H5265>happened,<s%> as they traveled <S%H6924>east,<s%> that they <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H1237>plain<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar,<s%> and they lived <S%H3427>there.<s%>

They <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H3051>to<s%> <S%H7453>another,<s%> <S%H3051>"Come,<s%> <S%H3835>let<s%>'s make <S%H3843>bricks,<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> them <S%H8316>thoroughly.<s%>" They had <S%H3843>brick<s%> for <S%H68>stone,<s%> and they used <S%H2564>tar<s%> for <S%H2563>mortar.<s%>

They <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3051>"Come,<s%> <S%H1129>let<s%>'s build ourselves a <S%H5892>city,<s%> and a <S%H4026>tower<s%> whose <S%H7218>top<s%> reaches to the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and <S%H6213>let<s%>'s make ourselves a <S%H8034>name,<s%> lest we be scattered <S%H6327>abroad<s%> on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> and the <S%H4026>tower,<s%> which the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H1129>built.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H259>"Behold,<s%> they are one <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they have all <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8193>language,<s%> and this is what they <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H6213>do.<s%> Now <S%H3808>nothing<s%> will be <S%H1219>withheld<s%> from <S%H2161>them,<s%> which they intend to <S%H6213>do.<s%>

<S%H3051>Come,<s%> <S%H3381>let<s%>'s go down, and there <S%H1101>confuse<s%> their <S%H8193>language,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> they may not <S%H8085>understand<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H7453>another<s%>'s <S%H8193>speech.<s%>"

So <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> scattered them <S%H6327>abroad<s%> from <S%H8033>there<s%> on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth.<s%> They <S%H2308>stopped<s%> <S%H1129>building<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

Therefore <S%H8034>its<s%> name was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H894>Babel,<s%> because there <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1101>confused<s%> the <S%H8193>language<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth.<s%> From <S%H3068>there,<s%> Yahweh <S%H6327>scattered<s%> them <S%H6327>abroad<s%> on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

This is the history of the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem.<s%> <S%H8035>Shem<s%> was one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H775>Arpachshad<s%> two <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3999>flood.<s%>

<S%H8035>Shem<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H775>Arpachshad,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
<S%H775>Arpachshad<s%> <S%H2425>lived<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%>- <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7974>Shelah.<s%>

<S%H775>Arpachshad<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7974>Shelah,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
<S%H7974>Shelah<s%> <S%H2425>lived<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5677>Eber:<s%>

and <S%H7974>Shelah<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5677>Eber,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
<S%H5677>Eber<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%>- <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H6389>Peleg.<s%>

<S%H5677>Eber<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H6389>Peleg,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
<S%H6389>Peleg<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7466>Reu.<s%>

<S%H6389>Peleg<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7466>Reu,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
<S%H7466>Reu<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%>- <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H8286>Serug.<s%>

<S%H7466>Reu<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H8286>Serug,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
<S%H8286>Serug<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor.<s%>

<S%H8286>Serug<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
<S%H5152>Nahor<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%>- <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H8646>Terah.<s%>

<S%H5152>Nahor<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6240>nineteen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H8646>Terah,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
<S%H8646>Terah<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H87>Abram,<s%> <S%H5152>Nahor,<s%> and <S%H2039>Haran.<s%>

Now this is the history of the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H8646>Terah.<s%> <S%H8646>Terah<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H87>Abram,<s%> <S%H5152>Nahor,<s%> and <S%H2039>Haran.<s%> <S%H2039>Haran<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3876>Lot.<s%>
<S%H2039>Haran<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H8646>Terah<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of his <S%H4138>birth,<s%> in <S%H218>Ur<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldees.<s%>

<S%H87>Abram<s%> and <S%H5152>Nahor<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H802>wives.<s%> The <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H87>Abram<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> was <S%H8297>Sarai,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor<s%>'s <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H4435>Milcah,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H2039>Haran<s%> who was also the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H3252>Iscah.<s%>
<S%H8297>Sarai<s%> was <S%H6135>barren.<s%> She had no <S%H2056>child.<s%>

<S%H8646>Terah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3876>Lot<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2039>Haran,<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> his <S%H3618>daughter-in<s%>-law, his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%>'s <S%H802>wife.<s%> They <S%H3318>went<s%> from <S%H218>Ur<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldees,<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%> They <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H2771>Haran<s%> and lived <S%H3427>there.<s%>
The <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8646>Terah<s%> were two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%> <S%H8646>Terah<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in <S%H2771>Haran.<s%>
